previous.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能將視頻通話和調度功能融入到您的服務中。Wondercall 2.0是更強大的嵌入式視頻通話系統的任何網站和應用程序。現在，您不僅可以撥打電話，還可以安排他們。和方式來檢查所有參與
